name: Hellshot
description:
Your name is unknown and so is your origin. The only one that know who you are is the government. You have to struggle through hoards of the government's failed experiments in order to find your way home and figure out who you are.

Story

As a child you always thought you were human. That was until you turned 10 and started getting powers. The older you got, the more visible they became. Your family were one of the first inhabitants of Mars after the first space shuttle got there in year 2023.

Your family only got more and more worried about you, until one day when a government official came and told you who you were. This made you angry and the only goal you have in mind is to figure out who made you like this and why.
